DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The purpose study explore efficacy safety H1-Coil deep brain rTMS subject negative symptom cognitive deficit schizophrenia ( deficit syndrome ) , currently treat atypical antipsychotic . Patient Population : The intention treat 45 patient diagnose schizophrenia , currently suffer mainly negative symptom cognitive deficit ( deficit syndrome ) . The patient racial , ethnic gender category , range 18 65 year age , PANSS negativeâ‰¥21 PANSS positive < 24 . Patients recruit academic private research center . Structure : The study randomize , prospective , 8 week , double blind study . Blinding : The treatment administrator study personnel patient mask treatment administrate . Concurrent Control : The study group receive active rTMS treatment control group receive inactive , sham treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability , Safety Efficacy H1-coil Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Subjects With Negative Symptoms Cognitive Deficits Schizophrenia
